adverbs.description: attractingly (comparative more attractingly, superlative most attractingly)

entries.meaning: In such a way as to attract.
examples: […]  the Osmund or Magneticall stone  […]  hath the two Poles (the one of them being of contrary qualitie to the other) the Axis, Equator, Meridians, Parallels, and so all the other Circles naturally and sensibly, as are imagined or fained to bee in the Heauens. All which the directory or inclinatory needles, will attractingly deliniate by their conformity and vnion, at conuenient Angles,
